content:
Here is the cleaned-up text:

If you want a messaging component to always show the same image or images, define the images in the Messaging Component Builder using constants. Standard constants are auto-created, while you create custom constants manually.

To add static images to a messaging component:

Create the messaging component in Setup.
Add one or more supported formats to the component.
Manage your constants on the Constants tab.
Update each format's image properties to use image constants.
Click a format name and for each image property, select the Constant type and select an image constant.

Note: Standard image constants are auto-created when you upload an image during the New Component setup flow. Custom image constants can be added after finishing the New Component setup flow using the ImageAsset type.
title: Adding Static Images to Service Cloud Messaging Components
